name: Bunny Bloody Cost
description:
Description

if your fps is low, download the windows version below 

You wake up in a strange dark room and find that you have to create a ritual that consists of killing a rabbit and bringing it to the ritual table. Explore the dark, scary and haunted house, find the rabbit and bring it back in order to complete the ritual but remember that nothing is as it seams.

Controls

w a s d - movement

mouse - look around

e - interact
